name: Sovereignty: Crown of Kings
description: Assume the leadership of one of the lands of Sovereignty and guide your people to glory and prosperity. By wisely combining soft and hard power, you can eventually hope to reign over the whole land. However, In this divided and merciless land, holding onto power is likely to prove harder than seizing it!
minimum_requirements: OS: OS: Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2.8 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 200 series or equivalent (OpenGL 3.0 support) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Integrated Graphic Cards  such as Intel HD series are not officially supported
recommended_requirements: OS: 7 or 8 Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 500 series or equivalent DirectX: Version 11
